text:
@RandPaul Karma just spoke. Next time don’t vote AGAINST coronavirus pandemic money to fight this insidious virus.

Btw, if he’s asymptomatic, how the hell was  he able to get the coronavirus test?!?

Hey @senatemajldr, your GOP numbers are dwindling.  

KARMAS A BITCH & SHE’s TICKED OFF!!
